name: What Happens at S.C.A.R
description:
S.C.A.R (Space Center for Alien Research) is where Lt. Karlson is posted. Faced with a suspicious system failure and mutant outbreak, which doesn't necessarily seem as it looks to be like.

Use W A S D to move around.

Left click for lazer and right click for flask-explosive.

E to interact.

Space to jump.

Developers:

Harman

Savio

Ved

Abhishek

WARNING

This can cause epileptic seizures, especially with sensitive people.

Assests used:

Character meshes from mixamo.com
sound effects from freesound.org
other assets(Gun and turret) from turbosquid.com
environment design elements from epic store marketplace
